### Research groups

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
group_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/research_groups.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Goal = descr,
                Group = paste0("<a href='",
                               url,
                               "' target='_blank'>",
                               "<img border = '0' src = '",
                               logo,
                               "' width = '250'></a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(Group, Goal)
DT::datatable(group_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```

### Journal papers

```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
paper_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/papers_journal.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = paste0("<a href='",
                               url,
                               "' target='_blank'>",
                               title,
                               "</a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(journal = paste0("<b>",
                                 journal,
                                 "</b>"))
DT::datatable(paper_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 'ftip'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```

<br/>

### Papers in Conference Proceedings

```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
paper_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/papers_conference.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = paste0("<a href='",
                               url,
                               "' target='_blank'>",
                               title,
                               "</a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(proceedings = paste0("<b>",
                                     proceedings,
                                     "</b>"))
DT::datatable(paper_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```
